meanings.definition: Having a stronger or more unpleasant smell than something else.
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the alley was much stenchier than the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese was definitely stenchier than the fresh bread.
meanings.sent3: The skunk thought the perfume factory was stenchier than its own spray.
meanings.sent4: The stenchier the socks, the faster they ran away from the laundry basket.
meanings.sent5: The stenchier the fish market, the more customers held their noses.

meanings.sent1: This room is stenchier than the one next door.
meanings.sent2: The garbage bin at the park is stenchier than the one at home.
meanings.sent3: The skunk felt stenchier after rolling in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The stenchier the situation got, the more air freshener was sprayed.
meanings.sent5: The stenchier the cheese, the more the mice celebrated.
